name: Swarm of Wolf Spirits
description: A formidable swarm of ghostly wolf spirits that is both agile and stealthy, capable of moving through objects.
memorable: Its ability to incapacitate foes with a chilling howl and pass through objects adds a unique twist to combat.
goals: Typically seeks to terrify and incapacitate foes in its vicinity.
relations: May be encountered alongside other undead or spectral entities.
environment: Usually found in dark, eerie settings where spirits might gather.
strengths: Immune to cold and poison damage, resistant to multiple damage types, and immune to many conditions.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to force damage and has a very low intelligence, hindering strategic capabilities.
attacks: Can make two spectralbite attacks that deal cold and necrotic damage, plus has a chilling howl ability to frighten enemies.
most_powerful_ability: The Chilling Howl incapacitating foes, causing damage and fear at the same time.
senses: It has darkvision up to 120 feet and a passive perception of 13.
skills: Possesses proficiency in Stealth and Perception, allowing it to remain undetected and notice intruders.
additional_information: Takes force damage if its incorporeal movement ends inside an object.
Can occupy the same space as other creatures, enhancing tactical combat options.
Does not require air, food, drink, or sleep, making it resilient to strategies targeting living creatures.
test_queries: ghostly wolf spirits that frighten foes
elusive undead that moves through objects
swarm with cold and necrotic attacks
